body: If you want to add the Unit of Measure to X and Y axis, you have to consider the changes highlighted in yellow in the python script editor: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/a5kYpi8WX59LyAHtP4FycPuATSOOeAlFQxSRU*lPcLvKYqOWROvSZNi7w8Ic*T9LTQxpWpNB4Bem60DrAyHg5IFBMViWk1WE/PsychrometricchartlabelUM.JPG)
